description: '''Malhun''' ([[Arabic alphabet|Arabic]] الملحون / [[ALA-LC]]: ''al-malḥūn''), meaning "the melodic poem", is a form of music that originated in [[Morocco]]. It is a kind of urban, sung [[poetry]] that comes from the exclusively masculine working-class milieu of craftsmen's guilds. On 6 December 2023, malhun was added to the [[UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage Lists]] of Morocco.
